name: Panel
description:
The Panel component is a container that can be optionally resizable. You can control its minimum, maximum, and default size. The resizing can be horizontal or vertical. It's styled with the glassmorphism theme.

## Props
- `children`: React nodes to be rendered inside the panel
- `className`: Additional CSS classes to apply
- `isResizable`: Boolean to enable/disable resizing (default: false)
- `minWidth`: Minimum width/height in pixels (default: 200)
- `maxWidth`: Maximum width/height in pixels (default: 600)
- `defaultWidth`: Initial width/height in pixels (default: 300)
- `direction`: "horizontal" or "vertical" resizing (default: "horizontal")
- `motionProps`: Additional props for framer-motion

## Example
```tsx
// Basic usage
<Panel className="w-1/4 h-full">Content</Panel>

// Resizable panel
<Panel 
  isResizable 
  minWidth={200}
  maxWidth={500}
  defaultWidth={300}
>
  Content
</Panel>

// Vertical resizing
<Panel
  isResizable
  direction="vertical"
  minWidth={100}
  maxWidth={400}
  defaultWidth={200}
>
  Content
</Panel>
```
